clinical_study.brief_title: Research on the Effect and Mechanism of Aerobic Exercise on PD
clinical_study.official_title: Research on the Effect and Mechanism of Aerobic Exercise on Parkinson's

lead_sponsor.agency: The First Hospital of Jilin University

clinical_study.source: The First Hospital of Jilin University

brief_summary.textblock: This trial is expected to recruit patients with primary Parkinson's disease and give them four consecutive weeks of aerobic exercise to observe its effect on Parkinson's disease and explore its mechanism

detailed_description.textblock: This trial is expected to recruit patients with primary Parkinson's disease who are distributed into tremor group and stiff group and give them the same kind of four consecutive weeks of aerobic exercise to observe its effect on Parkinson's disease and explore its mechanism

primary_outcome.measure: Movement Disorder Society-United Parkinson's Disease Rating Scale (MDS-UPDRS)
primary_outcome.time_frame: changes of MDS-UPDRS score from baseline at four weeks
primary_outcome.description: to assess the motor and nonmotor function of PD,0-200 scores,the higher scores mean lower function

primary_outcome.time_frame: changes of MoCA score from baseline at four weeks
primary_outcome.description: to assess the cognitive function of PD,0-30 scores,the higher scores mean better function

primary_outcome.time_frame: changes of ESS score from baseline at four weeks
primary_outcome.description: to assess the degree of drowsiness, 0-24 scores, the higher scores mean severe drowsiness

primary_outcome.time_frame: changes of NMSS score from baseline at four weeks
primary_outcome.description: to assess the non-motor of PD , 0-120 scores, the higher scores mean severe non-motor damage

secondary_outcome.measure: cerebral blood variation by Head MRI
secondary_outcome.time_frame: changes of the cerebral blood from baseline at four weeks
secondary_outcome.description: to assess the cerebral blood variation by head MRI

secondary_outcome.time_frame: changes of the cerebral blood flow velocity from baseline at four weeks
secondary_outcome.description: cerebral blood flow velocity is recorded using transcranial Doppler and a servo-controlled plethysmograph respectively.

secondary_outcome.measure: the level of arterial blood pressure
secondary_outcome.time_frame: changes of the arterial blood pressure from baseline at four weeks
secondary_outcome.description: arterial blood pressure is recorded using transcranial Doppler and a servo-controlled plethysmograph respectively. Both systolic and diastolic pressures will be assessed during the study period.

secondary_outcome.measure: the concentration of microRNA in peripheral blood by gene chip
secondary_outcome.time_frame: changes of microRNA from baseline at four weeks
secondary_outcome.description: to test the the concentration of microRNA in peripheral blood

arm_group.description: Participants in the tremor group have tremor as the main clinical manifestation
Participants in the tremor group have stiff as the main clinical manifestation

intervention.description: Participants ride an Acon-8650 model exercise bicycle 3 times a week for 1 hour each time for four consecutive weeks

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:
- Participants were diagnosed primary PD according to the 2015 MDS diagnostic criteria
- Participants are between 55 and 65 years old
Exclusion Criteria:
- Severe heart
- liver dysfunction
- kidney dysfunction
- severe cognitive dysfunction
- severe anxiety and depression
- history of mental illness
- history of cerebral infarction or ischemic attack in the past three months
- acute myocardial infarction or acute coronary in the past three months
- Parkinson's Pulse syndrome
- medication history (drugs that improve blood circulation in the brain and increase the excitability of the nervous system)
